here it is you can open it
output.sentences: These children are only friends with each other.
They are close to their mom, but there father is nowhere to be found.
Little Jarvis will never know the love of a caring fatherly figure.
His grandfather does the best he can to fill the role of the long lost Daddy Tyrone.
But regardless, the emptiness never leaves Jarvis' eyes. And there it will stay until his untimely death or incarceration.
